Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mornin', <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
You're sure working hard, considering how early
it is!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you have breakfast? I did! And it was
delicious. As usual! ♪

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Oh? I smell something scrumptious on you!
Do you have delicious food squirreled away?!
Come on, spill it! ...Not literally, though.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I just had lunch...but I'm already hungry again,
and dinner is sooooooo faaaaaar awaaaaaaaay...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I wanna sneak some snacks, but Pepita might
scold me again if I do...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What do you think, <MYNAME>? Blink once for
yes, twice for yes. Your answer is yes, yes?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm really hungry, I'll eat anything. Even if
it's just random food lying around on the street. I
don't care! I'm not proud!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Evenin', <MYNAME>. You're still working?!
Sheesh, you must be exhausted by now!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I ate my fill and now I'm full. Full of food. So
now it's sleepy time.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I had a lot of delicious food today. I wonder
what kind of food awaits me tomorrow...
Mmmmmm, I can't wait!

Content.VardId: 天気・季節ＭＳＧ（会話フラグOFFでしゃべる）
Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the sun hits me and warms me up, I can't
help but feel super-sleepy.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Rain, huh?
<PAGE>
When it's raining, I can't lie on the grass or I get
all wet, and that SUCKS.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a huge thunder cloud.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It looks like cotton candy to me. Huge,
waterlogged cotton candy. Mmmmmm,
waterlogged cotton candy... *drool*

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm staaaaaaaaanding in the rain... ♪
Just staaaaaaaanding in the rain... ♪
What a glooooorious feeeeeeeeling... ♪

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heya, <MYNAME>. Doesn't this wind feel great?
<PAGE>
Fall's my favorite time of year. Not just because
of the wind, but because everything tastes so
totally delicious! ♪

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it rains, you'll sometimes see bugs you
wouldn't see otherwise. They only come out in
the wet weather!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hi there! It's a lovely day isn't it? Sunny weather
is nice every now and again.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ahhh...
<PAGE>
Hmm? What am I doing with my mouth open?
I'm shoving snow into it, that's what! Snow is
so cold and yummy, I can't get enough of it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Problem is, when I eat snow, I get really
chilly... Brrrrr...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The wind is so strong that it might upset the
crops in the fields...
<PAGE>
And everybody's been working so hard to grow
them! I really hope they're okay once this all
blows over.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ahhh, sho...cold...
Cahn't...moof...mouth...fully...
Musht...shpeak...in...broken...shentenshes...
<PAGE>
Getting...shleepy...
NoMsg

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dessie is out today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...I dunno where she went. I forget.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When Dessie's not here, we have nothing to do
all day, and it gets real boring.
<PAGE>
So I'm spending my time trying to find
something good to eat.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You came to see Dessie?
<PAGE>
She's not here right now. I dunno where she
went.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Dessie is doing her best to learn what it takes to
be a proper goddess. One day, she'll be ready!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Springtime is the best time of year for naps.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But Gusto sometimes steps on me while I'm
napping, and that always wakes me up.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
These days, I often trip over walnuts along the
paths.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I don't mind, because hey, free walnuts!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can catch insects, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That's awesome! I'm too slow to catch any.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. You look like the heat's getting
to you too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Same here. We can be heat-suffering buddies!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are coral mushrooms called coral
mushrooms? Were they living under the sea
before they magically wound up here?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Honey bees are scary. I get attacked by them a
lot.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmmm, what a delicious-looking color!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Huh? Did I say something strange?
<PAGE>
I don't think it's strange. I mean, red and yellow
things look tasty, don't they?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I found a big chestnut! I wanna go home and eat
it RIGHT NOW!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When crickets start chirping, doesn't it make you
feel kind of excited and happy for some reason?
It does for me!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I came up with a brilliant idea! What if I
collected snow and poured syrup all over it?
Doesn't that sound delicious?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Huh? It's too cold for that right now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Hmmm... Is there some way to preserve snow
until summer? We could call it a "snow cone." It
would sell super-gangbusters!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maybe I should bring a snowball back home
with me and try to preserve it until summer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Umm... Ummmmmm....
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...I give up. I have no idea how to do that.
Boooooo...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Grrrg, I'm so hungry. I might need to go suck
some sap from the tree over there...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When I'm listening to the sound of a river, it
always makes me feel sleepy...because it's
like...a...lullaby...
<PAGE>
...lulling...bye...bye...sheeple...birdie...
Coooottage cheeeeeeese...strawberries...with
maaaarmalaaaaaade...  Mmmngngnggg...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Needlefish are in season, you know.
<PAGE>
I love fish! Not when they're swimming, but
when they're steaming on a plate in front of me.
Yummy, yummy!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oogh. I was just chased after by a really big bug.
That was super-scary!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Man, it's super-hot right now.
<PAGE>
I just wanna jump into the river. But Gusto
would scold me if I did that...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know that fish called the "char"? Apparently,
it can only live in clean water.
<PAGE>
Maybe if I go upstream, I'll have better luck
catching some...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, it's soooooo hot. How do insects do it?
How can they even move around on hot days
like this?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ever heard of "mackerel sky"? It's a phenomenon
you see a lot in the fall.
<PAGE>
Some people call it "scale sky" or "sardine sky"
instead.
<PAGE>
I'm okay with any of them, because they all
sound delicious!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fall is the time of year to catch delicious fish like
salmon and pike.
<PAGE>
Once it hits fall, that's when they start to get fat,
you see! Mmmmmm... Makes me drool just
thinking about it!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if tree sap is any good. I mean, you
always see beetles sucking on it. Stag beetles,
even! So how bad can it be?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The wind blowing in from the river? Ice cold.
The area around the spring? Also ice cold.
Brrrr... Everywhere you go is cold!
<PAGE>
Makes finding a good spot for a nap much
harder than it should be, I'll tell you that!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmmm... Are snowballs edible?
...I hope the food's ready soon. I'm starting to
get delirious!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Without all the fish and insects around, it sure is
quiet, huh?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are tea gardens around here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...I don't like tea very much, though.
<PAGE>
I mean, it's so bitter! Why would anyone drink
that?!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Different seasons produce different tea leaves.
Maybe I should try a few more varieties and see
if there isn't at least ONE I might like...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<FACE_SAD>Bugs? Not interested. Sorry.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ever heard of a fruit called...bananner, I think it
is? I hear it's really sweet.
<PAGE>
I'd like to try one sometime.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like fruit because it's naturally sweet.
<PAGE>
But there are sour fruit too, you know? One
time, I ate one by mistake, and that really took
me by surprise.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rare insects are rare because it's hard to find
them, right?
<PAGE>
Or is it because even when you do find them, it's
hard to catch them? Not that I really care either
way... I'm just curious!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Fall tea leaves have a certain...reputation.
<PAGE>
People say they're the bitterest of them all. So I
say, no thank you! You can keep your fall tea
leaves!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, have you heard of fruit called
"lemon"?
<PAGE>
I hear it's really, REALLY sour.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I want to try it, just to say I've had one, but...I
hate sour things. I don't know what to do!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Finally got nice and cool, huh? Seems the bugs
like this time of year, too.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always used to be able to smell tea gardens
around here, but I don't smell anything now.
<PAGE>
Probably because it's winter, and there aren't any
tea leaves that grow in winter!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you heard of "sugar cane"?
<PAGE>
I hear you can refine it into pure, delicious
sugar!
<PAGE>
And if you've got a lot of sugar, you can make
me desserts all the time! ♪

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With the insects and plants alike being fast
asleep, this whole area just gets really, really
quiet and peaceful, don't you think?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear it's easy to grow mushrooms as long as
you have the seeds for it.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Honey! The mere word alone just SOUNDS
delicious, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
...So, this is where you go to harvest honey,
huh? I feel like...I should make this place part of
my daily rounds. For...reasons...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...There aren't any beehives here, are there?
<PAGE>
'Cause, um, the bees and I don't get along so
well, to be honest.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Summer is corn season, for sure.
<PAGE>
But there's not a lot of corn to go around in
these parts, is there? That's so sad...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, you can make perfume out of flowers, right?
<PAGE>
I was wondering why people grow flowers,
since you don't eat them. But now I know! They
grow flowers to smell good! Case closed!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, when you take honey from a bee...does the
bee get mad?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, have you heard of green peppers?
They're supposed to be the bitterest vegetables
of them all! That sounds awful, doesn't it?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you spray perfume over a beehive, it might
help in the production of deliciously-balanced
honey.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So, is it true that honey from honey bees tastes
different than the honey you get from non-honey
bees?
<PAGE>
If it is, then what a magical world we live
in...because that's amazing!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it true you can't harvest honey during winter?
<PAGE>
That's a real shame. I don't want to wait until
spring to eat more honey!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's a..."blue rose"? Can you eat it? Is it
delicious?
<PAGE>
Oh, it's the name of a flower. I see, I see.
So...can you eat it? Is it delicious?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can't harvest honey during winter, right?
<PAGE>
The problem is, that just makes me want it
more!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Supposedly, the fields around here are perfectly
suited for growing leafy crops.
<PAGE>
Problem is, the flavor of leafy greens is a real
mystery to me. I don't get it at all!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mint smells so fresh, doesn't it? I bet it would
taste awesome if you ate it with cheese!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A small cabbage white butterfly perched on my
nose a little while ago. Did it think my nose was
a branch or something? I don't get it!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are "root crops"?
<PAGE>
Are those those vegetables where the edible
parts are buried in the ground?
<PAGE>
I wonder who the first person was to dig one up
and try eating the root. Whoever it was was a
genius, if you ask me! ♪

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you heard of watermelons?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Flik told me about them. He said they're
scaaaaaaaary...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Summer is when all the bugs come out, huh?
And it's hot, on top of that! Pretty tough time to
be outside...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love yams. So, so much.
<PAGE>
Pepita is a fan too. She cooks yam rice a lot
during the fall, but if it were me, I'd cook it even
more. I could eat it every single day!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rosemary is what Torque always drinks in her
herbal tea, right?
<PAGE>
I don't like tea, but I have to admit, I love the
way it smells.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There sure are a lot of dragonflies. Dragonflies
always remind me of the fall, and the fall
reminds me of...yams. Delicious yams...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Winter is the season of the radish.
<PAGE>
Sometimes, there's a spicy one mixed in with
the others, and when I take a bite out of it, I'm
kind of...shocked for a minute.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since this place is so enormous, nothing beats
the sight of it all covered in snow...
<PAGE>
If I started at the top and rolled myself down the
hill, I could be a snowman, you know!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Faraway countries can net you all kinds of rare
fish and insects. So in other words, if you're a
true collector, you've gotta travel!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, do you like fishing?
<PAGE>
I dunno about the fishing itself, but I sure do like
the idea of it...because I looooove eating fish!
They're super-tasty!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a good spot for catching fish. And also
possibly a good spot for swimming, though
you'll scare all the fish away if you do.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There sure are a lot of insects here. Probably
because it's so close to the river.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is this where all the paddies draw their water
from? I wonder if fish ever accidentally wind up
in the paddies...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I fell into the river from here the other day.
<PAGE>
...Got startled by an insect and tripped.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can see a lot of fireflies really clearly here,
since it's so close to the river.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
One look at the river and all I can think of are
pike, and salmon...
<PAGE>
...and now I'm drooling. *drool*

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you don't need to water crops in paddies.
But if that's the case...how do they get water?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever seen golden damselflies?
<PAGE>
Gusto showed me one the other day. It looked
like a yellow string. Strangest thing I ever saw!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since the fish put on some fat during winter,
they taste even much succulent than they do at
other times of the year.
<PAGE>
Guess it's to protect them from the cold, but as
far as I'm concerned, it's to up their
deliciousness by a factor of three!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The easiest crops to grow are the ones that can
cross seasons, since...well, you don't have to
worry about the changing of the seasons!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, did you know?
<PAGE>
Common darters can survive all the way through
winter in their adult stage. Guess they must have
a really high tolerance for the cold, huh?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What's my job here, you ask?
<PAGE>
Well, I've been assigned to cheer Dessie up when
she gets depressed.
<PAGE>
She often gets scolded by Pepita or Torque, and
it really brings her down.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Not that I don't get scolded by them all the time
myself...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I wanted to be the one in charge of cooking.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But people say I taste the food a liiiiiiittle too
much when I'm cooking...

Content.VardId: プレイヤーが渡した、見せたＭＳＧ
Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah! It's a scrumptious-looking
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!!
<PAGE>
This is my favoritest food in the world!
<PAGE>
Mmmm... Melted cheese can make anything
better!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, thank you, <MYNAME>. I really enjoy a
good <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> every now and
again.
<PAGE>
Don't you think milk is amazing? The source of
cheese, butter and yogurt alike... Spectacular!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Can I really have this? Like, for real?!
<PAGE>
I'm so happy! Thank you!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this for me? Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What...? Is this for me?
<PAGE>
Umm... Uh... Thank...you?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ulgh... <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>... It smells
sour...
<PAGE>
B-but it is a gift, so I'll take it...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa! Th-thanks
for...the...<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...
<PAGE>
...even if it...only has...things I hate in it...
Ulgh...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa! It's a beautiful <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!
Not just beautiful, but like, golden!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>! I love it!
<PAGE>
Don't you think milk is amazing? I mean, you
can make it into cheese, butter and yogurt alike.
So versatile! So...profound!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, look at it shine! It's gorgeous!
<PAGE>
Is it really for me? Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, look at it shine! It's gorgeous!
<PAGE>
Is it really for me? Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's shining like the noonday sun, and looks
absolutely glorious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...That said, I'm not really a fan of these in
general...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's shining like the noonday sun, and looks
absolutely glorious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...That said, I'm not really a fan of these in
general...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's shining like the noonday sun, and
looks...kind of okay...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...but...I don't know if you know I can't eat
these...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Is this for me? Wow, thank you,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
...Oh, but didn't you just give me something a
little while ago? I don't think I'd feel right taking
another gift so soon...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heya, bunny! Let's take another nap together real
soon, okay?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. Been a while, huh?
<PAGE>
...Is this a friend of mine? Well, of course it is!
The animals in the forest are friends to us all.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, hello there, ermine. I see you've become
fast friends with <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, hello there! Haven't seen you around much,
but I hope we can spend some more time
together.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, the "Flower Fair" is today, is it?
<PAGE>
Thank you for the flower.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Is that feather for me?
<PAGE>
Oh, it's not? You're just letting me see it? That
makes sense.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a beautiful ring.
<PAGE>
Were you looking to give it to someone?
<PAGE>
Well, I'll be cheering for you!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's a very nice wrapping job. I love the
color! Thank you so much for going to all this
trouble for little old me...

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you wrapped a present for me? Thank
you!
NoMsg

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy Birthday, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I brought you a present. Come on, take it!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy Birthday, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
And many more...so you can keep producing
delicious crops...forever and ever...

Content.VardId: 会話間隔が空いていたＭＳＧ
Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Ummmm...
<PAGE>
Oh, yes. <MYNAME>, right? It's been so long, I'd
almost forgotten your name!
NoMsg

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mrrrrng... I really need to get to sleep soon... I'm
so very, very sleepy...
